CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​FileSources.​Folder
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​FileSource
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​FileSources.​Folder

A file source representing a specific folder on disk.

Functions
Folder
public Folder (
Files.Manager manager,
Config.Targets.SourceFolder config
)

Instance constructor.  If the path is relative it will be made absolute using the current working folder.

Validate
override public bool Validate (
Errors.ErrorList errors
)

Makes sure the folder exists and adds an error if not.

Contains
override public bool Contains (
Path file
)

Returns whether this folder contains the passed file.

MakeRelative
override public Path MakeRelative (
Path path
)

Converts the passed absolute path to one relative to this source.  If this source doesn't contain the path, it will return null.

MakeAbsolute
override public Path MakeAbsolute (
Path path
)

Converts the passed relative path to an absolute one based on this source.  This may or may not result in a path that actually maps to an existing file.

AddAllFiles
override public void AddAllFiles (
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Calls Files.Manager.AddOrUpdateFile() for every file in the folder and its subfolders.

Properties
UniqueIDString
override public string UniqueIDString { get }

A string that uniquely identifies this FileSource among all others of its Type, including FileSources based on other classes.

Path
public Path Path { get }

The path to the FileSource's folder.

Type
override public InputType Type { get }

The type of files this FileSource provides.

Number
override public int Number { get }

The number assigned to this FileSource.

Name
override public string Name { get }

The name assigned to this FileSource, or null if one hasn't been set.
